Test Piece Contest
Verdi's Works [arr. W. Rimmer]
Castle Donington, Leicestershire, England, UK Prizes 1st £10, 2nd £4, 3rd £2, 4th £1. March contest 1st Kirkby Colliery, 2nd Swanwick Colliery. 7 bands competed.
Nov. 6, 2012, 12:09 p.m. Oct. 17, 2020, 9:08 p.m.
